channel.title: Adding Shops? I keep getting this error when I runserv
channel.description: I set up my shops and everything works good when i compile but then when i run serv and try to log in i get a shop handler error and it disconnects everyone...I dont know what the problem is if it is Item.java or what. I'm pretty sure I added the shops right though. If anyone knows how to fix this problem please tell me.

item.title: Adding Shops? I keep getting this error when I runserv
item.dc:creator: @puresdeath puresdeath
item.description:
@puresdeath wrote:

So the shop you are trying to create is ShopHandler, autospawn.cfg, and shops.cfg?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Shops? I keep getting this error when I runserv
item.dc:creator: @puresdeath puresdeath
item.description:
@puresdeath wrote:

Hmm if your new at creating shops, npc spawns, co-ords i would suggest using programs used for making them… Many sources have them included somewhere. Try finding Funscap3 2 I know there is an exellent folder with some of the best generators i have seen.

item.title: Adding Shops? I keep getting this error when I runserv
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

post shops.cfg pl0x?

Also make sure you have tabs and no spaces. If you want spaces in the names of your shops, you need underscores (_s)

Read full topic
